Package org.opengrok.indexer.web

Class Laundromat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.web.Laundromat
  • public class Laundromat
extends Object
    Represents a container for sanitizing methods for avoiding classifications as taint bugs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static String launderInput​(String value)
      Sanitize value where it will be used in subsequent OpenGrok (non-logging) processing.
      static String launderLog​(String value)
      Sanitize value where it will be used in a log message only.
      static Map<String,​String[]> launderLog​(Map<String,​String[]> map)
      Sanitize map where it will be used in a log message only.
      static String launderQuery​(String value)
      Sanitize value where it will be used in a Lucene query.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • launderInput

        public static String launderInput​(String value)
        Sanitize value where it will be used in subsequent OpenGrok (non-logging) processing.
        Returns:
        null if null or else value with "pattern-breaking characters" (tabs, CR, LF, FF) replaced as underscores (one for one)

      • launderQuery

        public static String launderQuery​(String value)
        Sanitize value where it will be used in a Lucene query.
        Returns:
        null if null or else value with "pattern-breaking characters" (tabs, CR, LF, FF) replaced as spaces. Contiguous matches are replaced with one space.

      • launderLog

        public static String launderLog​(String value)
        Sanitize value where it will be used in a log message only.
        Returns:
        null if null or else value with "pattern-breaking characters" tabs, CR, LF, and FF replaced as "<TAB>", "<CR>", "<LF>", and "<FF>" resp.

      • launderLog

        public static Map<String,​String[]> launderLog​(Map<String,​String[]> map)
        Sanitize map where it will be used in a log message only.
        Returns:
        null if null or else map with keys and values sanitized with launderLog(String). If the sanitizing causes key collisions, the colliding keys' values are combined.
